description: TEHRAN- News sources have quoted a statement by the Argentine President's office announcing that the Argentine government has designated Hamas as a terrorist organization. According to the statement, the president has also ordered the freezing of the properties of the Palestinian group.
title: AMIA case on the eve of its 30th anniversary

description: Hamas has called on Palestinians in the West Bank to “mobilize” in response to the strike in Khan Younis’ al-Mawasi.
title: Hamas calls on West Bank Palestinians to protest for Gaza

description: A spokesman for the Palestinian Authority presidency said: “The massacre in al-Mawasi is a continuation of the genocidal war against our people, and the US administration bears responsibility for the continuation of the massacres.”
title: PA: US bears responsibility for continuation of massacres

description: Action Aid denounced the Israeli strike on al-Mawasi saying, “We are utterly horrified and appalled by the devastating attack on the al-Mawasi area near Khan Younis and extremely concerned about the safety of our staff and partners in the area.”
title: Action Aid denounces Israeli attack on al-Mawasi

description: The Palestinian ambassador to the UK denounced the Israeli attack in Khan Younis as a “massacre”.
title: Palestinian envoy to UK: Netanyahu wants permanent aggression

description: Yemen’s Ansarullah condemned Israel’s deadly attack on al-Mawasi calling Israeli leaders “war criminals”.
title: Yemen's Ansarullah says ‘false claims’ cannot cover up al-Mawasi massacre

description: The Council on American-Islamic Relations (CAIR) highlighted Washington’s complicity in the Israeli massacre in al-Mawasi.
title: US Muslim group to Biden: Stop enabling these daily massacres

description: TEHRAN - In its editorial, Kayhan pointed out the expansion of Iran's relations with the world and wrote: Except for the Zionist regime, all the American continent except the United States, all the African continent and all the European continent except England are a vast international environment for the Islamic Republic and the field of national interests of Iran.
title: Foreign relations from Iranian perspectives

description: TEHRAN– The chief commander of Iran’s Army Air Defense Force has emphasized that developing domestically-produced weapons and military equipment remains a top priority for the force, highlighting significant advancements in this area.
title: Self-sufficiency in equipment production a top priority of Iran Army: commander

description: TEHRAN- The deputy head of the Judiciary for international affairs has submitted a list to the Iraqi government demanding the extradition of 120 terrorists to Iran.
title: Iraq receives Iranian request for extradition of 120 suspected terrorists: official

description: TEHRAN – The spokesperson for Iran's Ministry of Foreign Affairs has called out the international bodies for their silence in the face of Israeli crimes in the occupied territories.
title: Deadly silence of international bodies in face of Israel’s crimes unacceptable: Spox.

description: TEHRAN - President-elect Masoud Pezeshkian emphasized the necessity and importance of unity among all ethnicities and sects to address the challenges during a meeting with Sunni scholars.
title: Pezeshkian holds meeting with Sunni scholars

description: TEHRAN – The Iranian Embassy in London has strongly condemned the harassment of Iranian voters during the recent presidential elections, warning that those responsible for such "aggressive behavior" will face consequences without tolerance.
title: Harassers of Iranian voters in UK to be held to account soon: envoy

description: TEHRAN – In a recent announcement, the Ministry of Intelligence disclosed that its counter-terrorism unit has executed 79 targeted operations against terrorist elements from May to the beginning of July.
title: Ministry of Intelligence reports 79 counter-terrorism operations across country

description: TEHRAN – Nasser Kanaani, spokesperson and head of the Public Diplomacy Center of Iran’s Foreign Ministry, has reiterated the importance of deepening bilateral ties in a meeting with Maria Zakharova, the director of the Information and Press Department of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of Russia.
title: Tehran, Moscow reiterate desire to strengthen bilateral relations

description: TEHRAN – Nasser Kanaani, the spokesperson and head of the Public Diplomacy and Media Center of Iran's Foreign Ministry, has outlined Iran’s proposals for enhancing the role of BRICS member countries in the media and information sector.
title: Iran proposes strategic media collaborations at BRICS spokespersons summit

description: TEHRAN – Masoud Pezeshkian, the President-elect of Iran, convened with representatives of religious minorities in the Iranian Parliament on Saturday morning, marking a pivotal engagement in Tehran.
title: Pezeshkian engages with religious minority representatives in parliament

description: TEHRAN- Hamas military chief Mohammed Deif has achieved enormous popularity among Palestinian people in the Gaza Strip.
title: How Mohammed Deif became the symbol of Palestinian resistance

description: TEHRAN- Israeli warplanes have unleashed a barrage of bombs and missiles on a tent camp killing and injuring hundreds of Palestinians in an area that the Tel Aviv regime claimed to be a “safe zone”.
title: Horrifying massacre in “safe zone”

description: TEHRAN- Iranian director Ali Atshani’s movie “Loteria” will go on screen at the 30th edition of San Antonio Film Festival-SAFILM, which will be held in the U.S. city form July 30 to August 4.
title: U.S. film festival picks Iran’s “Loteria”

description: TEHRAN- “I Know Something You Don't Know” written by German author Brigitte Raab and illustrated by Manuela Olten has recently been published in Persian.
title: “I Know Something You Don't Know” at Iranian bookstores

description: TEHRAN-Millon auction house in Paris held the auction of Middle East 20th Century Art on July 11, where it presented works of Iranian, Arab, and Turkish artists.
title: Artworks by Iranian artists sell at Millon art auction

description: TEHRAN-The winning photos of the photography competition “Water in Iran” will be displayed at two exhibitions in Paris in September and October.
title: Paris to host Iranian photographers’ works on water

description: TEHRAN- For the first time, a tazieh performance on the martyrdom of Imam Hussein (AS) was held in Budapest, the capital of Hungary, coinciding with the month of Muharram and mourning ceremonies for the martyrdom of Imam Hussein (AS).
title: Tazieh performance goes on stage in Hungary

description: TEHRAN - Inter have confirmed the signing of Mehdi Taremi on a three-year contract following his departure from Porto.
title: Inter complete signing of Iranian forward Taremi

description: TEHRAN - For the first time, archaeologists have utilized Ground-Penetrating Radar (GPR) technology to uncover potential historical artifacts at the Jameh Mosque of Saveh, which dates from the 12th century.
title: Archaeological survey underway at Saveh’s 12th-century mosque using GPR technology

description: TEHRAN – Beaucoup tourism-related investment opportunities have been identified within Isfahan province by this point in the year, said a local official.
title: Isfahan to lift the curtain on piles of tourism investment

description: TEHRAN - Some national funds have been allocated to the North Khorasan province, situated in northeastern Iran, to restore its historical buildings and develop vital tourism infrastructure, a local official noted.
title: Funds to breathe new life into North Khorasan’s tourism

description: TEHRAN – Golestan Palace, which is Tehran’s sole World Heritage site, has unveiled an array of cultural and religious programs for Muharram, including a continuation of the Ashura curtain restoration project and staging numerous traditional ceremonies.
title: Historic Golestan Palace hosts special Muharram events

description: TEHRAN - Hormatollah Rafiei, the director of the Association of Iranian Travel Agencies, stated that Iran’s new unilateral visa waiver strategy has significantly boosted the tourism sector.
title: Visa waiver program lifts Iran’s tourism, expert says

description: TEHRAN – Located in the bustling heart of Tehran, the Sepahsalar mosque-school stands as a magnificent testament to Persian architectural ingenuity and cultural heritage.
title: Explore Sepahsalar mosque-school in downtown Tehran

description: TEHRAN- A group of entrepreneurs from Russia visited Amirabad port, in Iran’s northern Mazandaran province, on Saturday to invest in the production of oil products.
title: Russia ready to invest in Iran’s northern port

description: TEHRAN –Blood donation in Iran has increased by six percent during the spring season this year compared to the year before.
title: Blood donation rises by 6% in spring yr/yr

description: TEHRAN –Stefan Priesner, the UN Resident Coordinator for Iran, has said that the international conference on combating sand and dust storms which was held in September last year in Tehran will contribute to adopting measures to deal with the global predicament.
title: UN official: Tehran conference will contribute to addressing sand and dust storms

description: TEHRAN –Edurank, a global source for social media analytics in the education sector, has ranked 100 Iranian universities among the best universities worldwide for Artificial Intelligence (AI) based on their research performance.
title: Edurank places 100 Iranian universities among top institutions for AI

description: TEHRAN –Japan’s contribution to the United Nations High Commissioner for Refugees (UNHCR) in Iran boosts the country’s policies that allow Afghan refugees access to education and healthcare services.
title: Japan, UNHCR enhance healthcare, education for refugees in Iran

description: TEHRAN- Iran and Australia emphasized on the expansion of cooperation between the two countries in non-sanctions fields during a meeting held at the place of Iran Chamber of Commerce, Industries, Mines and Agriculture (ICCIMA).
title: Iran, Australia stress expansion of trade ties

description: TEHRAN - Head of Iran's Power Generation, Distribution, and Transmission Company (known as Tavanir) Mostafa Rajabi Mashhadi has said the country’s Energy Ministry plans to construct new power plants with a total capacity of 22,000 megawatts (MW) across the country, IRNA reported on Friday.
title: Iran to add 22,000MW to its power plants capacity

description: TEHRAN – The Organization of Petroleum Exporting Countries (OPEC) in its latest report has said Iran produced 3.251 million barrels per day (bpd) of crude oil in June, registering a 13,000-bpd increase compared to the previous month.
title: Iranian oil output still on upward trajectory: OPEC

description: TEHRAN - The World Bank (WB), in its latest report, predicted that Iran’s economy will grow 3.2 percent in 2024 and the inflation rate will decrease to 35.3 percent.
title: Iran’s economy to grow 3.2% in 2024: WB

description: TEHRAN – The head of the Lift and Escalator Component Manufacturers Association of Iran (known as LIEMA) has said more than 90 percent of the components and parts used in the escalators and elevators are currently being manufactured in the country, IRIB reported.
title: ‘Over 90% of elevator, escalator parts domestically made’
